verbs.description: hazmat spill shuts down roadway near conroe airport [ARG1: the texas department of transportation] [V: is] [ARG2: on the scene of a hazardous materials spill near the conroe airport that shut down a portion of fm 3083] early tuesday morning fm 3083 is shut down eastbound from fm 1484 to loop 336 for unknown period of time while crews work to clean the spill conroe police department sgt scott mccann said an 18 wheeler had leaked drilling mud on the frontage road on fm 3083 as they were going to a waste management dump mccann said houston regional airport texas department of transportation reporter sgt scott mccann conroe police department hazmat international sgt scott mccann txdot conroe fire department montgomery county police lone star executive airport conroe angelina trucking company conroe airport
